contact_info.name: Name
contact_info.disclaimer: Canlease is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy, and we'll only use your personal information to provide the services you requested from us. By creating this quote, you agree to be contacted by one of our representatives at a later time.

user_type_selection.header: Who are you creating this quote for?
user_type_selection.end_user: I am creating this quote for myself
user_type_selection.vendor: I am creating this quote for my customer

contact_us.description: Need help creating a quote? We are happy to assist.

instant_quote_limit.title: You have reached the limit for instant quote trial.
instant_quote_limit.description: Create a free account to create and track unlimited quotes and applications

quote_email_sent.title: Email sent!
quote_email_sent.description: The quote has been sent to your customer. Sign up to view this quote. Create and track unlimited quotes and lease applications with a free Canlease account.

view_quote.disclaimer_text: Quoted payments are pre-tax, subject to credit approval, and are based on first and last monthly payments in advance and one time documentation fee.

stretch.term_1: The Full Term  represents the total term of the lease, should you choose NOT to exercise your Purchase Option.
stretch.term_2: Cost of Finance represents the annual percentage of financing charges you will pay over the term of this rental contact.
stretch.term_3: Purchase Option represents When and How Much it will cost to assume ownership of the equipment. Example: on a 40M term, you can buy out the lease for 10% of the original cost at month 36 and not owe any further payments (months 37-38-39 and 40 will not be due).
stretch.term_4: All technology leases cannot exceed a 36-month term.

ten_dollar.term_1: Cost of Finance represents the annual percentage of financing charges you will pay over the term of this rental contact.
ten_dollar.term_2: Purchase Option represents When and How Much it will cost to assume ownership of the equipment.
ten_dollar.term_3: All technology leases cannot exceed a 36-month term.

view_quote.valid_text: This quote will be valid for 30 days.
view_quote.learn_more_text: Are you looking for a different kind of lease quote to suit your specific business needs (i.e. three month payment deferral, seasonal payments to match your income, large down payment, etc)? [Learn more](https://canlease.net/faq/)

rate_card.ten_dollar_purchase_term: Own for $10 at end of term

expiry_toast.message: This quote has expired. Please create a new quote.

description.default: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please verify your email to complete sign up.

forgot_password.description: Enter your email and we will send you a link to create a new password.

error_message.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
error_message.account_exist: An account with this email already exists
